hero.title: Miu2D Engine
hero.slogan: AI-Powered, Build Your Web RPG in 5 Minutes, Share with the World
hero.nativeBadge: ðŸ”§ Zero Dependencies Â· Pure Native Implementation
hero.mobileBadge: ðŸ“± Native Mobile Support Â· Play Anywhere

mobile.title: Native Mobile Support
mobile.subtitle: Perfectly optimized for phones and tablets with virtual joystick and touch controls - play classic Wuxia anywhere, anytime
mobile.hint: Open the website on your phone to start playing instantly - no download required

joystick.title: Virtual Joystick Control
joystick.desc: Precise character movement with the virtual joystick in the bottom-left corner, as responsive as native games

touch.title: Touch-Optimized Interactions
touch.desc: Tap to move, talk to NPCs, use items - all actions are just a touch away

responsive.title: Responsive UI Layout
responsive.desc: Interface automatically adapts to different screen sizes, perfect display from small phones to large tablets

demo.title: Live Demo
demo.subtitle: Classic Wuxia RPG 'Legend of Moon Shadow' Web Remake
demo.copyright: Game resources are copyrighted by Kingsoft. For demonstration purposes only, not for commercial use.
demo.hint: Click to move Â· Hold Shift to run Â· Alt+click for Qinggong

features.title: Powerful Engine Features
features.subtitle: Modern 2D RPG Engine built with TypeScript + React + WebGL

map.title: Map & Weather System
map.desc: Multi-layer tilemap, collision detection, A* pathfinding, map traps, dynamic weather like rain, snow, fog & day-night cycle

character.title: Character & Companion System
character.desc: Complete hero, NPC, and companion systems with state machine animation, sprite rendering, hot-reload config

script.title: Powerful Script Engine
script.desc: Rich script commands for dialogue, branching, triggers, variable system - write complex storylines with ease

magic.title: Magic & Combat System
magic.desc: Active/passive skills, real-time combat, effect rendering, cooldown & damage calculation for exciting battles

ui.title: Rich GUI Components
ui.desc: Inventory, equipment, skills, dialogues, shops - all-in-one UI components ready out of the box

audio.title: Web Audio Effects
audio.desc: Background music, ambient sounds, skill effects - immersive audio powered by Web Audio API

items.title: Inventory System
items.desc: Complete item management with equipment, consumables, drag-and-drop - build your inventory gameplay

save.title: Save System
save.desc: Full game state persistence with multiple slots & auto-save - continue your adventure anytime

debug.title: Debug Tools
debug.desc: Built-in debug panel with perf stats, collision visualization, variable inspector - your dev companion

highlights.title: Core Highlights
highlights.subtitle: What once required a team now takes just minutes to build an online RPG

ai.title: AI-Powered Content Generation
ai.desc: Leverage AI agents to automatically generate game scripts, dialogues, and map layouts. From story outlines to complete scenarios, AI understands your creative intent and brings it to life.

scripting.title: Universal Script Engine
scripting.desc: Write game logic in your preferred language. Full support for WASM, Python, Lua, and JavaScript with hot-reload capabilities and powerful debugging tools.

debug.title: Powerful Script Debugging
debug.desc: Built-in visual debug panel for real-time game state, variables, and NPC positions. Supports breakpoints, step execution, and hot-reload to make game development twice as efficient.

collision.title: Advanced Collision System
collision.desc: Precise sprite and magic collision detection with customizable hitboxes, layer-based filtering, and efficient spatial partitioning for large-scale battles.

trap.title: Map Traps & Obstacles
trap.desc: Create dynamic map interactions with trap triggers, obstacle zones, hidden passages, and scripted events that respond to player actions.

performance.title: Performance Stats & Smart Preloading
performance.desc: Built-in real-time performance monitor showing FPS, memory usage, and render time. Smart preloading system loads resources ahead based on player position for smooth gameplay.

mapEditor.title: Visual Map Editor
mapEditor.desc: Built-in visual map editor for creating and editing game maps. Browse map files, view tilemap layers, collision zones, and portals. Real-time preview with smooth navigation.

asfEditor.title: ASF Sprite Editor
asfEditor.desc: Professional sprite animation viewer and debugger. Browse ASF files, preview animations frame by frame, adjust playback speed, and visualize sprite sheets for character and effect development.

asyncLoading.title: No Downloads, Play Instantly
asyncLoading.subtitle: Legacy games were built for Windows 98/XP and won't run on modern systems. Our web version is natively cross-platform - just open your browser and play. Only 5MB needed to start from 2GB of resources.

demo.win11Error: This program is not compatible with Windows 11. Please run on Windows XP
demo.macError: Cannot start: DirectX components not found. Windows only
demo.mobileError: This program cannot run on mobile devices

onDemand.title: Smart On-Demand Loading
onDemand.desc: Resources load as players explore. No waiting for full downloads - play while loading, saving 90%+ bandwidth.

features.feature1.title: Instant Start
features.feature1.desc: Less than 5MB initial load, game starts in 3 seconds
features.feature2.title: On-Demand Fetch
features.feature3.title: Smart Caching
features.feature3.desc: Loaded resources cached for zero-wait revisits
features.feature4.title: Resume Support
features.feature4.desc: Auto-retry on network issues, ensuring integrity

tech.title: Modern Tech Stack
tech.subtitle: Built with latest web technologies for smooth development experience

cta.title: Start Your RPG Journey
cta.subtitle: Join us, enjoy game development with AI-assisted coding

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.desc: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved
